attributes.action: stop the new Cornwall Unitary Authority from creating a new Cornish Logom for the county
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are very concerned that the new Unitary Authority for Cornwall as from April 2009 wants to change the Cornish Logo, We want the existing one retained.  There is no merit whatsoever in changing it amd moreover a waste of money.

rejection.details: Typo in title? 'Logom'. Pls. amend and resubmit
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
